mapper.select: SELECT bi.test_method,bi.test_case FROM test_item_method_rel mr LEFT JOIN basic_test_info bi ON bi.test_method = mr.test_method WHERE mr.test_item_id = #{itemId}

SELECT cc.id,cc.com_name,cc.sub_contract, li.lab_name,di.device_name,dir.item_id,dir.price,dir.period FROM check_company cc INNER JOIN lab_info li ON cc.id = li.com_id INNER JOIN device_info di ON di.lab_id = li.id INNER JOIN device_item_rel dir ON dir.device_id = di.id
